id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1328.76
text: When I say the word IT, what do you think of?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1332.6
text: I think of email servers and software patches and things like that.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1338.6
text: Sam, what about you?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1340.2
text: I think I'm biased.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1341.08
text: I thought more of a strategy oriented, how you're enabling connectivity within the organization.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1348.68
text: We're not using your answer.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1349.8
text: No, no, no.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1350.2
text: Okay.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1351.48
text: I'm an IT prof, so that's maybe my bias there.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1354.92
text: But do you think most people go operations?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1357.24
text: When I say IT, most people will talk about the help desk.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1361.24
text: They'll talk about outages.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1362.76
text: They'll talk about services, trouble tickets, data centers, right?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1367.0
text: Okay.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1367.3200000000002
text: When I say technology, people say, you know, the future, innovation, new things, right?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1373.16
text: So if you're in a business and someone introduces someone who's in the IT department, they have

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1379.4
text: one reaction.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1380.1200000000001
text: If I introduce someone to you and I say, this is in the case of Starbucks, Starbucks technology,

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1385.8
text: which one sounds and feels more future leaning?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1390.04
text: Actually, that's a huge difference.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1391.6399999999999
text: It's a huge difference.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1392.52
text: I definitely see the difference there.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1394.6
text: Right.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1394.84
text: Which is why I said words really matter.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1397.48
text: And so we were talking about transformation and how do you transform a technology organization

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1402.6
text: to the future?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1403.32
text: And so one thing that's one of these tried and true things is, did you name your organization

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1408.1999999999998
text: a way that makes the organization proud so that every single person in the organization

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1413.56
text: sits up a little straighter and maybe works a little harder?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1416.2
text: Have you named the organization in a way that really represents what you want it to become?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1421.24
text: And have you named it in a way that everyone else in the business looks at it and goes,

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1425.0
text: oh, that's something a little different?

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1427.64
text: Okay.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1428.04
text: So I know a long answer to one of the things that I think is really important in transformation

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1433.72
text: is to signal that you're doing it.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1436.04
text: And so, for example, with Starbucks, when I joined, 90 days after I joined, changed the

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1441.32
text: name of IT to Starbucks Technology.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1444.2
text: Never used the word IT again.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1445.72
text: And if I was ever in a meeting where somebody said IT, I'd stop the meeting and I'd say,

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1449.48
text: we don't have IT, we have a Starbucks Technology.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1451.32
text: And it's kind of funny because that one change made a big difference.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1455.72
text: The next thing that I think can make a difference is you need a tagline.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1460.2
text: I hate to say it, but everybody in business, everyone who's a CEO knows it.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1463.96
text: You got to tell your story and you don't get five hours to tell your story.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1468.36
text: You get six to 10 words and you better get people curious to ask more.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1474.52
text: And so put a tagline in place, super simple, talented technologists

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1481.7199999999998
text: delivering today leading into the future.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1486.28
text: Starbucks Technology, that's it.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1488.6
text: And that simple phrase, which is used today still after six years, just continues to reinforce

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1497.16
text: the value of the organization, the value of the people, the importance of getting the work done,

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1502.68
text: as well as continuing to build for the future.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1505.3200000000002
text: And so for me, transformation comes down to people.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1508.44
text: To do any transformation with tech has nothing to do with the tech as much as it has to do

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1512.04
text: with the people who are making it happen.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1514.68
text: They have to feel inspired.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1516.44
text: They have to feel what they're doing is important.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1518.68
text: And they have to feel like they have room to be part of the invention of the future.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1523.32
text: And I think that's all we have to do as leaders is make room for that.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1527.72
text: Jerry, it was great talking with you.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1529.08
text: You're such a vast experience and a great ability to connect those experiences together to give us

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1534.28
text: a holistic view of what's happening and what may happen in the future.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1537.8
text: Thank you for taking the time.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1539.24
text: It's been really wonderful.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1540.28
text: Thank you.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1541.08
text: It's been fun.

title: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger
id: Transforming a Technology Organization for the Future - Starbucks' Gerri Martin-Flickinger-t1541.8799999999999
text: Thanks so much.
